author: Android Hell

changelog.release_notes: I redid the entire code so that I use time formatting code toe get the data. It cut out a whole bunch of extra cruft and looks a lot nicer. The app itself still looks pretty much the same. I still have commented out code for if I ever decide to add functions for buttons.
Initial release. Not a lot to mention. Just shows day of year, current calendar date, 12 hour and 24 hour time.

description:
**Update: I redid everything so there is a lot less code and the time actually updates now. **

This is a simple watch app used to show you the day of year. It was initially intended to help me keep track of DoY for when I am doing field work like plant mapping. 

I decided to upload it since Pebble doesn't seem to have an app that shows DoY.

It shows Day of Year, of course. But it also displays the current calendar date, 12 hour and 24 hour time.

latest_release.release_notes: I redid the entire code so that I use time formatting code toe get the data. It cut out a whole bunch of extra cruft and looks a lot nicer. The app itself still looks pretty much the same. I still have commented out code for if I ever decide to add functions for buttons.

title: Day of Year
